general.title: General Settings
general.zoomDescription: Adjusts the zoom level to make content easier to read.

telemetry.title: Telemetry
telemetry.description: This records anonymous usage data to improve the product.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.resetDescription: This will delete all your apps, chats, and settings. This action cannot be undone.
dangerZone.resetConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset everything? This will delete all your apps, chats, and settings. This action cannot be undone.
dangerZone.resetSuccess: Successfully reset everything. Restart the application.
